page.title: 12EDUCATION - 1.
page.content: {LIFE AT OUR SCHOOL. } A typical day begins with Assembly. The morning is usually spent in basic subjects. We have lessons in P.E., Swimming, Art, Practical Science,R.E., Music, History and Geography. Now we are practising for Sports Day while some of the older children are training for the District Athletics. We watch films and Schools T.V., such as Zig-Zag and Science Workshop. We have small classes for solo instruments and a School Choir. We do plays and musicals such as "Tiny Tim's Christmas Carol." Our current projects are about Durham Cathedral and Energy. {S.Bowater. {NOW I AM ELEVEN.} Half of me wants to go to the Comprehensive School, to travel to school by bus, wear uniform, wrestle with a wider range of subjects -but the other half is sorry to leave the Juniors. {S.Nield.
